Author: patri3110
Text: You're right. Idk it's just really discouraging because I know I can feel this exact same way all while still being happy with losing more and more weight. But you're right im gona get past this stupid anorexia telling me this bs:)

Author: GlassSnowdrops
Text: That's difficult but I'd say don't get discouraged. Your body didn't get to where it is in a week and it certainly won't recover in one. I've not been feeling any physically better from eating yet either. If you can keep going, please do. Going back to where you were won't give you anymore energy and the relief you might feel is just your ED covering up how much damage it's doing to your mental health.
